dct_title_s: Kingdoms of the successors of Alexander in the middle of the third century
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. At head of map: Dr. William Smith's Ancient atlas. 5. Plate 5 from: Atlas of ancient geography, biblical and classical ... / edited by William Smith and George Grove. London : J. Murray, 1874. Insets: Kingdoms of the successors of Alexander after the division at Babylon (323) and Triparadisus (321) -- Kingdoms of the successors of Alexander after the battle of Ipsus (301 B.C.) Historic Maps copy imperfect: lower edge trimmed with loss of imprint.
